entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 12 except 8 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 12 except 8 in onshore winds. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Flurries inland overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 15 May 2016
